long_description: Inspired by the inevitable, repeated impacts of park and pipe riding, the comfortable and durable Giro Combyn snow helmet absorbs high- and low-energy impacts to guard your noggin all day long. Rigorously lab- and field-tested Super Fit(TM) engineering incorporates careful anatomic measurements and rider input to offer high-performance fit and comfort. Fit Kit(TM) pad system lets you adjust the fit in seconds without tools; simply choose the best combination of fit pads that come with the helmet and swap them out. Durable and comfortable soft-shell construction combines an impact-absorbing liner with a flexible outer shell. Stack Vent(TM) design offers seamless integration of goggles and helmet ventilation; it aligns a helmet vent with your goggles' center vent, helping keep goggles clear. Super Cool(TM) vents invite cool, fresh air into the helmet while pushing hot, stale air out; optimized vent shapes help regulate temperature to keep you feeling fresh. Compatible with after-market Giro audio systems (sold separately). The Giro Combyn snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet standards.
